title: 148862442.a Wealth Of Information
excerpt: It’s highly likely that your friends, coworkers and peers have an abundance of knowledge and insights you’re not aware of.

children.text: It’s highly likely that your friends, coworkers and peers have an abundance of knowledge and insights you’re not aware of.
Everything from what it’s like to fly a plane, to find a sitemap, to make kombucha, parent a child, or paint a mural.
Everything from the next best show to watch, book to read, podcast to hear, or food joint to hit up.
Learning about the things that the people around know that you don’t can be a highly effective way to expand on what you do know.
Of course, you’ll never know unless you ask.
